title: HeyHoney - Your NSFW AI Sex Chatbot
introduction: Meet Lucy, your very own sexy virtual companion who is available for flirty banter, meaningful connections, or naughty late-night fun. Lucy is accessible 24/7 and offers different packages for users.
features: Get 5 daily messages in the free package
Unlimited daily messages in the premium package
Saved conversations and faster response times in the premium package

faqs.question: Will My Chats Be Anonymous?
faqs.answer: Yes, all HeyHoney users have complete anonymity when chatting with Lucy.

faqs.question: HOW LONG CAN I SPEAK TO THE CHATBOT FOR?
faqs.answer: You can speak to Lucy for as long as you want, depending on your subscription plan.

faqs.question: What If I Donâ€™t Want To Be A Premium User Anymore?
faqs.answer: If you no longer want to be a premium user, you can cancel your subscription at any time.
